description.black-white:
The user makes a soothing bell chime
to heal the status problems of all the
party Pokémon.
description.ruby-sapphire:
Chimes soothingly to heal
all status abnormalities.

effect.full: Removes major status effects and confusion from every Pokémon in the user's party.
effect.shortEffect: Cures the entire party of major status effects.
